title: Executive Assistant with CSR Experience | Full Time | 13month Bonus + Yearly Raises
job_overview:
About Our Company
Global Edge Solutions is a dynamic consulting agency that partners with fast-growing businesses across various industries. We specialize in providing executive and operational support that helps our clients run more efficiently and scale with confidence. As part of our continued growth, we are seeking a highly organized and proactive Executive Assistant—female candidates only—with a strong background in inbound office phone sales, scheduling, and customer service to support one of our U.S.-based clients.

Job Summary
We are looking for a detail-oriented Executive Assistant (with CSR Experience) to work closely with company leadership—managing calendars, coordinating tasks, tracking projects, and providing high-level administrative support. This role also involves a significant amount of inbound customer interaction via phone, assisting with scheduling and answering client inquiries. The ideal candidate is female, has exceptional English communication skills (10/10), and thrives in a remote, fast-paced work environment where multitasking and professionalism are key.

Key Responsibilities
- Manage executive calendars, schedule meetings, and track key tasks and deadlines
- Organize internal notes, documents, and communications on behalf of leadership
- Handle email inboxes, follow-ups, and reminders
- Answer inbound calls, assist with phone-based sales inquiries, and provide high-quality customer service
- Coordinate with clients or partners for scheduling and task completion
- Support customer service overflow by responding to inquiries and follow-up messages
- Prepare reports, internal summaries, and project updates
- Collaborate with operations and support teams to ensure smooth day-to-day workflows
- Maintain confidentiality and professionalism when handling sensitive information

Requirements
- Female applicants only
- Fluent or near-native English communication skills (verbal and written – 10/10)
- At least 2 years of experience in an Executive Assistant, Admin Support, or similar role
- Proven experience in inbound phone-based customer service, scheduling, and/or office phone sales
- Excellent organizational and multitasking abilities
- Proficiency with Google Workspace, Microsoft Office, CRM platforms, and project management tools
- High attention to detail and ability to anticipate team needs
- Self-driven and able to work independently in a remote setting
- Familiarity with U.S. time zones and business practices is a plus

We Offer
13th-month pay bonus
Fully remote position
Opportunities for growth and development
Collaborative and supportive virtual team environment
